short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch DVR adds DVR style controls to Twitch streams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch DVR adds YouTube-like DVR functionality to Twitch streams. This allows you to rewind live video (a max of about 60 seconds) without having to create a clip or watch the VOD after the stream is finished.
